segments.text: Mr . Black has been getting a little on the side .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I am surprised . He doesn't look like a guy who'd ever cheat on his wife , does he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he doesn't . Anyway , his wife found out that he has been two-timing for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am really surprised . By the way , have you done anything behind my back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . The only thing I've ever done behind your back is zipping you up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like that joke , but I hope it's true .
segments.speaker: S2
